authors.author: Fanny J. Crosby William J. Kirkpatrick

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: A wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord,

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: A wonderful Savior to me.

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines: He hideth my soul

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines: In the cleft of the rock,

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines: Where rivers of pleasure I see.

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: In the cleft of the rock

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: That shadows a dry, thirsty land.

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: He hideth my life

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines: In the depths of His love.

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines: And covers me there with His hand.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: A wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: He taketh my burden away.

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines: He holdeth me up

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines: And I shall not be moved.

verse.name: v2e
verse.lines: He giveth me strength as my day.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines: With numberless blessings

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines: Each moment He crowns;

verse.name: v3c
verse.lines: And filled with His fullness divine,

verse.name: v3d
verse.lines: I sing in my rapture, "Oh, glory to God

verse.name: v3e
verse.lines: For such a Redeemer as mine!"

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines: When clothed in His brightness

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines: Transported I rise,

verse.name: v4c
verse.lines: To meet Him in clouds of the sky,

verse.name: v4d
verse.lines: His perfect salvation,

verse.name: v4e
verse.lines: His wonderful love I'll shout

verse.name: v4f
verse.lines: With the millions on high.
